thread.title: Tomas Berdych sets up Stockholm final against Jack Sock
thread.title_full: Tomas Berdych sets up Stockholm final against Jack Sock

title: Tomas Berdych sets up Stockholm final against Jack Sock
text:
Tomas Berdych sets up Stockholm final against Jack Sock 24 Oct 2015 15:01:57 
comments 
Defending champion Tomas Berdych will face Jack Sock in the final of the Stockholm Open. 
Top seed Berdych progressed after less than half an hour on court, with semi-final opponent Marcos Baghdatis going down 6-1 in the first set then retiring through injury. 
"It's not the way you want to finish a tennis match, but it's sports and it's unfortunate that it happens," Berdych told atptour.com. 
"You just wish all the best for Marcos. He's a friend and a great guy, but I'm through to the final and there's one more match to go." 
That will come against American Sock, who won his first tour title in Houston this year. 
The seventh seed knocked out number two Richard Gasquet 6-4 6-2 in a clinical display that ended with four successive aces. Related Sport News
